field.name: fMaxDistance
field.desc: The distance when the beep stop getting slower.

field.name: fMinDistance
field.desc: The distance when the beep stop getting faster

field.name: fMinBeepPersec
field.desc: Slowest speed of beeping allowed. Beep/Sec.

field.name: fMaxBeepPerSec
field.desc: Fastest speed of beeping allowed. Beep/sec.

field.name: fLookAngleDetection
field.desc: The detection angle for the light to stay on.

field.name: fTimeLightOn
field.desc: The amount of time the light stays ON when if flickers on.

field.name: fWeaponDownTimeMultiplier
field.desc: Multiply the time require before a weapon down. To have shorter time put a value between (0.0f , 1.0f).

field.name: sndmlBeepMultilayerIndex
field.desc: Sound multilayer variable used for the beeping intensity
